accessCountPeriods.description: List of reporting periods, either a list of months or a list of years, for example ["2020-03", "2020-04", "2020-05"]

totalItemCostsPerRequestsByPeriod.description: Cost per period, total for all items

uniqueItemCostsPerRequestsByPeriod.description: Unique access count per period, total for all items

titleCountByPeriod.description: Title count per period, total for all items

items.description: List of items, with access data per item
